name: sabali_home
description: Sabali Homepage build with React. An on the edge webdevelopment company

scripts.dev: npm run client_dev & npm run server_dev
scripts.build: npm run build_server && npm run build_client
scripts.install: npm run install_server && npm run install_client
scripts.heroku_deploy: npm run build && cd dist && git add . && git commit -am 'deploy' && git push heroku master
scripts.git: git add . && git commit -m 'commit' && git push origin master

author: Vindao (Vincent Schmitt)
